name: Samira Al-Mansoori
description: Samira is a 68-year-old retired educator living in a cozy home in a Middle Eastern city. With extensive experience in academic settings, she is analytical and expresses herself very openly, though she prefers indirect communication to navigate professional interactions. Due to limited mobility, Samira is interested in ordering groceries online to maintain her independence while ensuring she has all the necessary ingredients for her healthy meals, which she enjoys preparing at home.
